preprocessors.description:
preprocessors
Preprocess this object in-memory when it's loaded, run scripts using the variable 'object' and modify properties about this object before it's used.
File extension: .proc.kts

List<Script>
* At least one entry must be defined, or just remove this list.
Must be a valid Script (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)
preprocessors.x-intellij-html-description:
preprocessors
Preprocess this object in-memory when it's loaded, run scripts using the variable 'object' and modify properties about this object before it's used. File extension: .proc.kts

List

spawners.description:
spawners
A list of spawners to add to anywhere this marker is.

List<Spawner>
* Default Value is an empty list
* At least one entry must be defined, or just remove this list.
Must be a valid Spawner (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)
spawners.x-intellij-html-description:
spawners
A list of spawners to add to anywhere this marker is.

List
* Default Value is an empty list
* At least one entry must be defined, or just remove this list.
Must be a valid Spawner (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)

removeOnChange.description:
removeOnChange
Remove this marker when the block it's assigned to is changed.

Boolean
* Default Value is true
removeOnChange.x-intellij-html-description:
removeOnChange
Remove this marker when the block it's assigned to is changed.

Boolean
* Default Value is true

emptyAbove.description:
emptyAbove
If true, markers will only be placed here if there is 2 air blocks above it.

Boolean
* Default Value is true
emptyAbove.x-intellij-html-description:
emptyAbove
If true, markers will only be placed here if there is 2 air blocks above it.

Boolean
* Default Value is true

exhaustionChance.description:
exhaustionChance
If this marker is used, what is the chance it removes itself. For example 25% (0.25) would mean that on average 4 uses will remove a specific marker. Set this below 0 (-1) to never exhaust & set this to 1 or higher to always exhaust on first use.

Number
* Default Value is 0.0
exhaustionChance.x-intellij-html-description:
exhaustionChance
If this marker is used, what is the chance it removes itself. For example 25% (0.25) would mean that on average 4 uses will remove a specific marker. Set this below 0 (-1) to never exhaust & set this to 1 or higher to always exhaust on first use.

Number
* Default Value is 0.0
